name: Self Defense
description:
3D First-person shooter Tower Defense Game!

Enjoy up to 21 challenging levels,

Think before you place a tower, 

Who said that the enemy's routes are constant?

The towers can't handle the job? Defend by yourself and save the day!

Plan your own winning strategy!

Created by:

Calle Ryge Carlsen

Gustav Dobel

Emil Lovstrand Mortensen

Nir Cohen Hershkovitz
